text: Orders of Magnitude is an album by American synthpop band Information Society released on March 11, 2016. The tracks include cover versions of the Human League's "Don't You Want Me" and the Sisters of Mercy's "Dominion". "We were powerfully affected by these songs, and now we echo that effect back out", said the group in comments at a press conference in Davos, Switzerland, timed to coincide with the World Economic Forum meeting taking place there this week. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Kurt Harland * Paul Robb * James Cassidy ==References== ==External links== * Bandcamp store * Official Site Category:Information Society (band) albums Category:2016 albums Category:Covers albums
title: Orders of Magnitude (Information Society album)
